concept.title: View Test Usage and Balance in the Usage Dashboard

conbody.p: Organizations in are limited in how many tests can be run monthly, defined as your monthly quota. This quota is defined by the license plan of your Account. You can view the current test execution quota, usage, and remaining balance in the Usage Dashboard.

ul.li: Owner or Admin role in an Organization.

note.p: Find out more about the licensing model and test execution quota here: Katalon Platform Plans.
